description: Multi-day treks or speedy thru hikes demand lightweight equipment. The Borea Carbon Pro have a combination of carbon and titanal sections to shave grams while maintaining durability where you need it most.Lightweight carbon fibre uppers and an extra-durable Titanal lower section.Glove-friendly high-density aluminum Powerlock 3.0 adjustment mechanism is slim and light while providing superb holding power.Lightweight Trek Pro Foam grips and padded straps are comfortable in the hand.Mini Ultralight Vario trekking baskets included.Tungsten carbid flex tip provides solid grip.
name: Komperdell Borea Carbon Pro Poles - Women's
